channel.title: Ineptitude on Grad Student Problems

item.title: Canadian Visa
item.description: Being an Indian means that I’ve to apply for a visa even for short visits when travelling internationally. This is usually a small loss of money and time and I’ve never had any trouble with this process. That was until I applied for a Canadian visa in the US. The Canadian government (fucking idiots) has outsourced the visa application process to a third party. These people are fucking morons incapable of making a sensible website and having the most arcane methods of application.
